summary: With over 14 years of experience in Software Engineering, I have brought projects from mock-ups into production. As a senior full stack engineer, I have always strived to deliver something that causes a wow at first glance, and reliable solutions. As a team player, I always look to help others and learn from them. For me, Software Engineering is a philosophy, not a simple job.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Led the continuous development of clients' dApps through full-cycle management: development, delivery, and deployment.
Directly interacted with Web3 APIs on custom made blockchain projects.
Worked on building core functionalities of the Unchained platform, like the Sia library.

experience.title: Co-Founder & CTO
achievements: Built a platform to manage candidates selected from LinkedIn.
Integrated AI features to transform recruitment processes becoming the first to use AI in the Brazilian market.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Led the migration of SonarCloud issues screen to MIUI using React.
Developed critical features for CaYC methodology and Clean Code Taxonomy.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Enhanced various mobile application functionalities, enhancing rent processes and stabilizing Bluetooth.
Published the app on leading stores, amplifying customer outreach.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Led multiple valuable contributions into developing Anibis messenger.
Led the migration of the messaging service to a different messaging provider.
Performed as a Scrum Master for the Aldrin squad.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed React components for Adobe Content Manager.
Implemented features for the SkyQ application of British Sky Broadcasting.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Built the company's main front-end application using React and Redux.
Launched the application into beta testing as the first front-end developer.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Developed features in JavaScript and jQuery for the Landing Pages squad.
Contributed to the migration of the landing pages editor to a WYSIWYG editor.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Implemented features for a JIRA plugin for testing management using Angular.js.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Everyone starts somewhere, right?
Developed key features for a file processing tool for financial analysis.

projects.description: A recruitment platform integrated with LinkedIn that leverages AI for efficient candidate management and decision making.
